title: Instagram Post Scraper Input
description: Configuration for scraping Instagram posts with comprehensive data extraction

usernames.title: Instagram Usernames
usernames.description: List of Instagram usernames to scrape posts from (without @ symbol)

postUrls.title: Direct Post URLs
postUrls.description: List of direct Instagram post URLs to scrape

maxPostsPerProfile.title: Max Posts per Profile
maxPostsPerProfile.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape from each profile

includeComments.title: Include Comments
includeComments.groupDescription: Configure what data to extract from posts

maxCommentsPerPost.title: Max Comments per Post
maxCommentsPerPost.description: Maximum number of comments to extract per post (only if comments are enabled)

includeMentions.title: Include Mentions
includeMentions.description: Extract user mentions from post captions

dateFrom.title: Date From
dateFrom.description: Only scrape posts newer than this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

dateTo.title: Date To
dateTo.description: Only scrape posts older than this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

maxRequestRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests

requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.title: Request Timeout
requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.description: Timeout for processing each request in seconds
